Author: not_the_cicada
Text: Lick a little bit of salt as well; you are likely low on electrolytes. Try just lying still, eating whatever is easily palatable, and try to modulate your temperature.  ðŸ’•

Author: Airisvel
Text: It's great that you show some concerns, and yes, you should. The real question is can you? Do your best. Eat a little something if possible, and drink a lot.  Hope you'll feel better soon. ðŸ’•
